titleStmt.title: The sincere milk of the Word, for the children of Barmuda [sic]. In a short and plain catechism. By Mr. Sampson Bond, late Minister of that island. [Two lines from Psalms]
titleStmt.author: Bond, Samson.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Green, & J. Allen,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2525 lacks preliminary leaf.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
